body: # More about me * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sbrenner) * [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stephanbrenner) # Spare time projects ## Apps [InstantRuby](http://wp10714721.server-he.de/?page_id=671) – Windows Store app to develop and execute simple Ruby programs [Namenstage](http://wp10714721.server-he.de/?page_id=532) – Windows Phone app for displaying German name days ## Freeware [See here](http://wp10714721.server-he.de/?page_id=3) ## Open Source [See here](http://wp10714721.server-he.de/?page_id=824)
